item.title: Use Dropbox for static file delivery
item.description: Not a new idea i guess, but a convenient and cost-efficient way to separate binary content from my blogs text and metadata is to copy all the images and other static data to dropbox and link to it with a public sharing link and the ?dl=1-parameter as described in this article at the dropbox help center. The benefits are: Workflow-friendly local file management, editing and syncing Always at least one local backup of all files on disk The structure of a shared link is consistent and easy to migrate if needed: https://www.
